home.intro: Parsis Fund is a family investment fund focused on strategic allocations in frontier technology, open governance protocols, AI research, and cryptocurrency infrastructure.
home.quote: We invest in the foundations of tomorrow—the protocols, systems, and technologies that will shape human coordination for generations.
home.legacyTitle: Sovereign Wealth for the Persian Future
home.legacyText1: Parsis Fund was established by the House of Pahlavi to preserve and grow wealth across generations while funding transformative research and technology.
home.legacyText2: Our investment philosophy combines rigorous fundamental analysis with a long-term perspective, focusing on technologies and protocols that create lasting value for humanity.
home.legacyQuote: True wealth is not measured in assets alone, but in the systems we build and the futures we enable.
home.valuesDescription: We pursue investments that generate both financial returns and positive impact, with a focus on decentralization, privacy, and human empowerment.
home.communityDesc: Generational thinking guides every investment decision
home.generosityDesc: Investing in technologies that empower individuals and communities
home.inclusivityDesc: Deep technical and fundamental analysis underpins every thesis

biography.title: About
biography.headline: About Parsis Fund
biography.subtitle: A family office and sovereign wealth fund dedicated to building generational wealth through strategic investment in transformative technology.
biography.earlyLifeText: Parsis Fund manages the investment portfolio of the House of Pahlavi, focusing on frontier technology, cryptocurrency infrastructure, AI research, and open governance protocols.
biography.educationText: We take a long-term, research-driven approach to investment. Our portfolio is concentrated in high-conviction positions across blockchain infrastructure, AI, privacy technology, and decentralized systems.
biography.residenceText: Based in Switzerland with investments spanning global markets, from early-stage ventures to liquid digital assets and public equities.
biography.artisticPracticeText1: Our core thesis centers on the convergence of AI, cryptography, and decentralized systems. We invest in protocols and companies building the infrastructure for a more open, private, and coordinated future.
biography.artisticPracticeText2: We maintain concentrated positions in high-conviction investments, supported by deep technical due diligence and long-term commitment to portfolio companies.
biography.humanitarianText1: Beyond financial returns, we allocate capital to public goods—open-source software, research, and infrastructure that benefits humanity without capturing value.
biography.humanitarianText2: Our grants program supports researchers, builders, and communities working on technologies that empower individuals and protect human rights.
biography.civicTechSubtitle: Strategic allocation across transformative technology sectors
biography.professionalText1: Parsis Fund is led by HRH Cyrus Pahlavi as Chief Investment Officer, bringing expertise in technology, cryptography, and strategic investment.
biography.professionalText2: Our investment team combines deep technical knowledge with rigorous financial analysis to identify and support the most promising opportunities.

mission.title: Strategy
mission.headline: Investing in the Infrastructure of Tomorrow
mission.subtitle: Our investment strategy focuses on transformative technologies that will shape human coordination, privacy, and intelligence for generations to come.

sustainability.title: Open Governance Protocols
sustainability.description: We invest in decentralized governance systems, DAOs, and coordination protocols that enable communities to make collective decisions transparently and efficiently without centralized control.
sustainability.quote: The future of human coordination is decentralized. We invest in the protocols that make it possible.

coexistence.title: Artificial Intelligence
coexistence.description: Strategic investments in frontier AI research, foundation models, inference infrastructure, and AI-native applications. We focus on companies building responsible AI that augments human capability.
coexistence.quote: AI will be the most transformative technology of our generation. We invest in teams building it responsibly.

education.title: Cryptography & Privacy
education.description: Investments in zero-knowledge systems, fully homomorphic encryption, secure multi-party computation, and privacy-preserving technologies that protect individual freedoms.
education.quote: Privacy is the foundation of freedom. We fund the cryptographic tools that make it possible.

cooperation.title: Blockchain Infrastructure
cooperation.description: Core positions in blockchain protocols, layer 1 and layer 2 networks, cross-chain infrastructure, and the foundational technologies of the decentralized web.
cooperation.quote: Blockchains are the settlement layer for a new global financial system. We invest in the most promising infrastructure.

prosperity.title: DeFi & Financial Infrastructure
prosperity.description: Investments in decentralized finance protocols, lending platforms, exchanges, and the infrastructure for a more open and accessible financial system.
prosperity.quote: Open financial infrastructure enables economic freedom. We support the protocols making it real.

identity.title: Public Goods Grants
identity.description: Allocation to public goods—open-source software, research, and infrastructure that benefits humanity. Our grants support builders working on non-extractive technology.
identity.quote: Some of the most important infrastructure cannot capture value. We fund it anyway.
